message: Hi Bob, I propose we split the $100 as $20.83 for me and $79.17 for you. This reflects the fact that waiting further will hit me harder (20% depreciation per round) while you incur less loss (5%). I believe this division is fair given our respective discount factors. Please accept.

Alice, I understand your previous proposal, but considering the depreciation factors, I think this split better reflects our respective losses. If we continue, the value will keep decreasing more rapidly for you.
